content: वैकृत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ती|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Changed. {@--2@} Modified. --तं [विकृतस्य भावः अण्] {@--1@} Change, alteration, modification. {@--2@} Aversion, disgust, loathing. {@--3@} Change in state, appearance &c., disfigurement; <ls>N. 2. 5.</ls> {@--4@} A portent, any event foreboding evil; तत्प्रतीपपवनादि वैकृतं प्रेक्ष्य <ls>R. 12. 62.</ls>
